basicInfo.notes: Founded 2018 by Anurag Goel (former Stripe head of risk). Headquartered in San Francisco. Raised $157M total, $80M Series C in Jan 2025. Positioned as modern Heroku alternative. Zero DevOps cloud platform. Billing prorated to the second. Formerly known as Cove Studios. Investors include General Catalyst, Bessemer Venture Partners.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: No refunds; Free tier available; Pay-as-you-go billing

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Pay-as-you-go; Bandwidth included in web service pricing
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Crypto mining; abuse; excessive resource usage
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Hobby $0/user; Professional $19/user; Organization $29/user; Web services: Free (512MB), Starter $7, Standard $25, Pro $85; Postgres free tier 256MB; Storage $0.30/GB; HIPAA 20% compute premium or $250 min; Billing prorated to second; Static sites free

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: Modern cloud platform; Standard content policies

editorial.knownIssues: Mixed Trustpilot reviews (2.5); Free tier data loss reports; Unexpected charges on free tier; No live chat or phone support; No serverless functions like Lambda; Limited compared to AWS/GCP for complex needs; Reliability concerns for some workloads
editorial.bestFor: Modern web applications; Node.js/Python/Ruby backends; Heroku refugees; Developers wanting simple deployment; Docker deployments; PostgreSQL databases; Static sites (free); Preview environments
editorial.avoidIf: Need WordPress hosting; Want serverless Lambda functions; Need live chat support; Running mission-critical enterprise apps; Concerned about free tier limitations; Need extensive compliance certifications
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Modern Heroku alternative; G2 4.3 good, Trustpilot 2.5 mixed; $157M raised; Founder ex-Stripe; Simple pricing vs AWS complexity; Billing per-second; Static sites free; Competes with Heroku, Railway, Fly.io; No serverless functions

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Modern Heroku alternative with per-second billing, free static sites, and simple Docker deployments
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Developer or startup wanting simple cloud deployment without AWS/GCP complexity, especially Heroku users seeking modern alternative

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Render is good for modern web apps with G2 4.3 rating. Positioned as Heroku alternative. Trustpilot 2.5 reflects some reliability and billing concerns.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Render is an independent VC-backed company founded in 2018 by Anurag Goel (former Stripe head of risk). Raised $157M. Headquartered in San Francisco.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Free tier available. Web services: Starter $7/mo, Standard $25/mo, Pro $85/mo. Postgres from free (256MB) to Pro tiers. Static sites free. Per-second billing.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Easy for developers familiar with Git and Docker. Simple dashboard. Not ideal for non-technical users or WordPress.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, Render does not include email hosting. Use third-party services.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Technically possible but not optimized. Render is designed for modern web applications, not WordPress. Use WordPress-specific hosts instead.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Render guarantees 99.95% uptime for paid plans with SLA.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, pay-as-you-go billing. Free tier available. No long-term contracts.
